Protocol# LazyCollectionProtocol

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
protocol LazyCollectionProtocol : Collection, LazySequenceProtocol where Self.Elements : Collection
```

### [Conforming Types](/documentation/Swift/LazyCollectionProtocol#conforming-types)

- [`LazyDropWhileSequence`](/documentation/swift/lazydropwhilesequence)Conforms when `Base` conforms to `Collection`.

- [`LazyFilterSequence`](/documentation/swift/lazyfiltersequence)Conforms when `Base` conforms to `Collection`.

- [`LazyMapSequence`](/documentation/swift/lazymapsequence)Conforms when `Base` conforms to `Collection`, `Element` conforms to `Copyable`, and `Element` conforms to `Escapable`.

- [`LazyPrefixWhileSequence`](/documentation/swift/lazyprefixwhilesequence)Conforms when `Base` conforms to `Collection`.
